TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRegisteredObject

summary.span: 为宿主环境所管理的对象定义方法。

span.span: Defines methods for objects that are managed by the hosting environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象必须实现接口才能向宿主环境注册, 并使其生存期由宿主环境管理。Objects must implement the interface in order to register with the hosting environment and have their lifetime managed by the hosting environment. 您可以通过在应用程序管理器上调用方法来创建已注册对象的实例。You can create an instance of a registered object by calling the method on the application manager. 应用程序管理器将新创建的对象返回到调用方, 然后调用方可以调用对象上的特定于类型的方法。The application manager returns the newly created object to the caller, which can then call a type-specific method on the object. 在启动过程中, 已注册的对象应调用方法来完成对象的注册。During startup, the registered object should call the method to complete registration of the object. 当应用程序管理器需要停止已注册的对象时, 它将调用方法。When the application manager needs to stop a registered object, it will call the method. 应用程序只能有一个已注册类型的实例。Applications can have only one instance of a registered type. 若要创建已注册类型的多个实例, 请使用工厂模式来创建一个对象管理器, 该对象管理器已注册到该应用程序, 然后管理多个实例。To create multiple instances of a registered type, use the factory pattern to create an object manager that is registered with the application and then manages the multiple instances. 有关实现工厂模式的对象的示例, 请参阅类的示例。For an example of an object implementing the factory pattern, see the example for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Stop(bool immediate) cil managed

param.name: immediate
param.span: 如果注册对象应在返回前从宿主环境中注销，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate the registered object should unregister from the hosting environment before returning; otherwise, .

summary.span: 请求注销一个已注册对象。

span.span: Requests a registered object to unregister.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序管理器将调用方法来请求注册的对象取消注册。The application manager will call the method to ask a registered object to unregister. 在方法的处理过程中, 已注册的对象必须调用方法。During processing of the method, the registered object must call the method. 第一次调用`immediate` `false`方法时, 参数设置为。 The method is first called with the `immediate` parameter set to `false`. 对象可以完成处理、调用方法, 然后返回, 也可以在调用方法之前异步返回并异步处理。The object can either complete processing, call the method, and then return or it can return immediately and complete processing asynchronously before calling the method. 如果在应用程序管理器的超时期限到期之前, 注册的对象未完成处理, 则会再次调用方法, `immediate`并将参数设置`true`为。If the registered object does not complete processing before the application manager's time-out period expires, the method is called again with the `immediate` parameter set to `true`. 当参数为`true`时, 已注册的对象必须在返回前调用方法; 否则, 应用程序管理器将删除该方法的注册。 `immediate`When the `immediate` parameter is `true`, the registered object must call the method before returning; otherwise, its registration will be removed by the application manager.
